description:
This market refers to the Rainbow Six Siege match between G2 Esports and Dplus in the Six Invitational Group C, scheduled for February 4 at 12:00PM ET.

This market will resolve to "G2 Esports" if G2 Esports wins 2 or more games than Dplus in this match.

Otherwise, this market will resolve to "Dplus".

If the match is canceled (not played at all), ends in a tie, or is delayed beyond 7 days from the scheduled date without a winner determined, this market will resolve to 50-50. 

If the match begins but is not completed, and one team wins due to the opponent's forfeiture, disqualification, or walkover, this market will resolve to 50-50. 

If the match ends in a forfeit, disqualification, or walkover (team withdraws before the start and the other wins automatically), this market will resolve to 50-50.

events.description:
This market refers to the Rainbow Six Siege match between G2 Esports and Dplus in the Six Invitational Group C, scheduled for February 4 at 12:00PM ET.

This market will resolve to "G2 Esports" if G2 Esports win the match against Dplus.

This market will resolve to "Dplus" if Dplus win the match against G2 Esports.

If the match is canceled (not played at all), ends in a tie, or is delayed beyond 7 days from the scheduled date without a winner determined, this market will resolve to 50-50. 

If the match begins but is not completed, and one team wins due to the opponent's forfeiture, disqualification, or walkover, this market will resolve to the team who wins. 

If the match ends in a forfeit, disqualification, or walkover (team withdraws before the start and the other wins automatically), this market will resolve to 50-50. 

The resolution source for this market will be official information from https://liquipedia.net/rainbowsix/Main_Page.
events.title: Rainbow Six Siege: G2 Esports vs Dplus (BO3) - Six Invitational Group C

question: Game Handicap: G2 (-1.5) vs Dplus (+1.5)
